00000000100000010010010000100011        // sw x8, 8(x2)
00000000011100010000000110010011        // addi x3, x2, 7
01000000000100011000001000110011        // sub x4, x3, x1
00000000100000010010001010000011        // lw x5, 8(x2)
00000000010100110000111110110011        // add x31, x6, x5
00000000001100010110001110010011        // ori x7, x2, 3
00000001111100010010010010100011        // sw x31, 9(x2)
